body.name: Evenflo Pivot Suite Travel System with LiteMax Infant Car Seat with Anti-Rebound Bar Dunloe Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 47 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 6 hrs 47 mins
features: DISCOVER SUITE FOLDING VERSATILITY: Stroller folds quickly in parent or forward-facing mode with the toddler seat attached — and the spacious seat, which accommodates a child up to 45 in. tall, folds in half for a more compact stow

SWITCH MODES WITH EASE: With no tools necessary, the built-in seat swap adapter flips easily to transition from infant car seat to a more spacious, upright toddler seat, which also converts to lay-flat carriage position for a total of 6 modes of use

SECURE YOUR SUITE-PEA: Give your little one comfort in the LiteMax Infant Car Seat with Anti-Rebound Bar, which helps to absorb and dissipate crash forces to help provide additional stability and give you peace of mind
ENJOY A SMOOTHER RIDE: Rear suspension gives this stroller a smooth ride over varied terrain from gravel to grass

LOAD UP YOUR RIDE: Includes a cup holder and a large storage basket with front and rear access to carry a diaper bag with the day’s essentials — add on a Rider Board or Child Snack Tray for even more versatility (each sold separately)
body.description: Welcome to the Suite Life! With a stroller that folds in two directions — parent-facing or forward-facing, the Evenflo® Pivot® Suite Travel System is bound to be your new favorite way to travel with your child. From the makers of the #1 Selling Stroller System in the US*, the Pivot Suite offers a total of 6 modes of use — infant car seat mode, lay-flat carriage mode and toddler seat mode, all offering parent-facing and forward-facing versatility. It’s a breeze! Carriage mode? Get rolling in an instant! Toddler mode? Transforms in seconds! The Pivot Suite Travel System makes life on the go easier for parents. A large storage basket gives you ample space to fit a diaper bag and everything you need for the day. Add a Stroller Rider Board or Child Snack Tray to personalize your stroller (each sold separately). Enjoy all the fun you’ll have together, knowing your tiny tot is comfortable! Rear suspension and cruiser tires give you a smoother ride over all kinds of terrain, from grass to gravel. The LiteMax™ Infant Car Seat is lightweight. The included base with anti-rebound bar helps absorb and dissipate crash forces. Attach the infant car seat to the stroller with a built-in adapter. No tools required! A larger toddler seat will fit your child up to 45 in., allowing the Pivot Suite to grow with your child. Get ready to flip your expectations with Pivot Suite Travel System with LiteMax Infant Car Seat! At Evenflo, we go above and beyond government standards to create car seats that are safe. The Evenflo LiteMax Infant Car Seat meets or exceeds all applicable federal safety standards. It is structural integrity tested at energy levels approximately 2x the federal crash test standard, and it is side-impact tested, rollover tested and temperature tested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: everything about this system has been great for me. i love the car seat and the fact that the newborn insert inside fit my preemie sized baby, my daughter is small and she fits safely and snug into the car seat and i feel very confident in the safety of my daughter while she’s in this car seat. the car seat is VERY padded which i love it is very comfortable for baby and very safe if an accident were to happen. i love that she will be able to use this car seat for awhile as i’m so in love with how comfortable and safe it is and easy to use. i love that the car seat just clips right into the stroller set up , makes errands , walks, trips very easy to just grab the car seat and snap it into the stroller with out having to disturb the baby at all , definitely one of my favorite things of it all & the system is much nicer and has many more uses than some of its competitors in my opinion. i love that there’s an option for the pram style stroller as well it’s nice to just lay the baby down also as you can sit them up. overall it’s very easy to use and very easy to set up in all of its settings and i love how universal it is and will fit the needs of your child for a long time. it’s also very durable , folds up very nicely easily fits my trunk of my small car and still have extra room for other things. i love that also the bottom of the stroller is so spacious to be able to fit a diaper bag and purse or whatever else you may carry with you. it is also a very aesthetically pleasing and sleek design very nice look. i am definitely recommending this travel system to every parent i know , well worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stroller
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and also easy to attach and remove car seat and pram attachment. Car seat base also easy to install in car. Only stroller you will ever need since pram turns into a toddler stroller seat. Light weight and easy too fold to load and unload out of vehicle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Left Rear wheel started unscrewing itself off during first use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. 0 stars if I could. After the countless reviews on how nondurable the wheels of this stroller are, I decided to give this stroller the benefit of the doubt and I purchased it a two days before my newborn was born, after the first use the Left Rear wheel started coming off by unscrewing itself as I pushed it down the street with my baby in it, i regret purchasing this stroller and spending my money on it. The customer service is horrible as I’ve reached out multiple times and have yet to get a response. This stroller put my baby in danger , would NOT recommend. Pls Keep your babies safe by not purchasing this as some strollers come defective like mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy but has lots of features
reviews.reviewText: It’s a stroller, car seat, bassinet. Wheels turn easy will need to practice to get familiar with all features

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Wheels were easy to put on and is simple to switch between car seat and carriage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Missing Cup Holder !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Easy assembly I give it that . I’m just disappointed that the package is missing the cup holder that is included with the stroller . That’s one of the exciting parts for me as I was looking forward to use that cup holder for my Starbucks lol. I will be reaching out to see if they can send me the missing cup holder part . Hoping for the best . The stroller over all is perfect . Sleek and lightweight but I expected to be a bit small . The handle is larger than expected .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to put to use
reviews.reviewText: My baby liked her car seat and it feel safe for her

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Rear wheel fell off while walking with the baby. Tried to contact the manufacturer but they indicated they were too busy to respond. As time is very important with a new child, we went out and bought another brand of stroller to continue our walks. The defective stroller was returned for a refund.
